Radio.description: Allows communication over long distances between devices. Range can be adjusted.

Micro H.I.D..description: Heavy electrical device designed for the termination of anomalies.

SCP-500.description: Instantly restores all health and cures most afflictions.

High-Explosive Grenade.description: A high explosive dealing significant damage. Detonates after a brief delay once thrown.

Flashbang Grenade.description: Blinds and disorients your enemies. Detonates after a brief delay once thrown.

SCP-018.description: Superball with the ability to bounce with extreme efficiency. Deadly ricochet at high speeds.

SCP-268.description: When worn, temporarily makes you invisible unless it is interrupted by any user interaction.

Adrenaline.description: Provides a temporary health boost and a short burst of stamina.

Coin.description: You're not sure why you'd want to carry this around...

SCP-2176.description: Your very own Ghostlight! Caution: Fragile. Disrupts electronics when broken.

SCP-244-A.description: An ancient vase, freezing to the touch. Creates a large cloud of icy fog when placed.

SCP-244-B.description: An ancient vase, freezing to the touch. Creates a large cloud of icy fog when placed.

SCP-1853.description: Increases dexterity and weapon handling when your life is in danger.

3-X Particle Disruptor.description: A strange weapon that fires powerful, disintegrating energy beams.

SCP-1576.description: Allows temporary communication with the dead. Can be used again after some time passes.

Anti-Cola.description: The result of an experiment with SCP-914. Good for your health, bad for your motor skills. Will save your life in a pinch.

Lantern.description: A classic oil lantern, inscribed with the name "Daniel".

SCP-1344.description: A set of modified goggles that lets you perceive the positions of other players through walls. Once worn, they must never be removed!

Surface Access Pass.description: Single-use access pass for opening exit gates.
